title: Please help to id this font - bold comic-like price tag
content:
Thank you very much in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082839/http:/typophile.com/files/a_18.jpg) | 43.5 KB |
author: contohabc

comments.content:
[Blambot](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082839/http:/blambot.com/fonts.shtml) might have something you'd like. Try "Damn Noisy Kids" or "Umberto".

- Lex

Or you might also check [Letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082839/http:/letterheadfonts.com/) ... for instance ... [Splash](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082839/http:/letterheadfonts.com/contributors/chuckdavis/splash.shtml)
Or [Cincinnati Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082839/http:/letterheadfonts.com/contributors/arthurvanson/cincinnatiposter.shtml), look at the S, not too many numbers in the sample though.
Nice one, Ignacio, I knew they had something a little closer.
[Breaking the Norm](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082839/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/btn/) has a few energetic faces that may suite the need as well.
